vsim.riscv.instructions

Class Instruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • vsim.riscv.instructions.Instruction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Add, Addi, And, Andi, Auipc, Beq, Bge, Bgeu, Blt, Bltu, Bne, Div, Divu, Ebreak, Ecall, Fadds, Fclasss, Fcvtsw, Fcvtswu, Fcvtws, Fcvtwus, Fdivs, Fence, FenceI, Feqs, Fles, Flts, Flw, Fmadds, Fmaxs, Fmins, Fmsubs, Fmuls, Fmvwx, Fmvxw, Fnmadds, Fnmsubs, Fsgnjns, Fsgnjs, Fsgnjxs, Fsqrts, Fsubs, Fsw, Jal, Jalr, Lb, Lbu, Lh, Lhu, Lui, Lw, Mul, Mulh, Mulhsu, Mulhu, Or, Ori, Rem, Remu, Sb, Sh, Sll, Slli, Slt, Slti, Sltiu, Sltu, Sra, Srai, Srl, Srli, Sub, Sw, Xor, Xori

    public abstract class Instruction
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Instruction represents an abstract instruction implementation.
